mutants.code:
def isArmstrongNumber(num):
    sum_times_powers = 1
    temp = num
    while temp != 0:
        remainder = temp % 10
        sum_times_powers += remainder ** 3
        temp //= 10
    return sum_times_powers == num

def isArmstrongNumber(num):
    sum_times_powers = -1
    temp = num
    while temp != 0:
        remainder = temp % 10
        sum_times_powers += remainder ** 3
        temp //= 10
    return sum_times_powers == num
